scripts.lint: npm run lint:registry && npm run lint:templates
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:registry:fix && npm run lint:templates:fix
scripts.lint:registry: eslint --no-config-lookup --format compact --parser yaml-eslint-parser --plugin yml --ext .yml --rule 'yml/quotes: ["error", { prefer: "double" }]' --rule 'yml/indent: ["error", 2]' --rule 'no-trailing-spaces: "error"' registry
scripts.lint:registry:fix: eslint --fix --no-config-lookup --format compact --parser yaml-eslint-parser --plugin yml --ext .yml --rule 'yml/quotes: ["error", { prefer: "double" }]' --rule 'yml/indent: ["error", 2]' --rule 'no-trailing-spaces: "error"' registry
scripts.schema: npm run schema:registry && npm run schema:templates
